alert.note: Alert for Dent; Shannon; Texas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 4:46PM CDT until March 31 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Shannon County in south central Missouri... Southern Dent County in south central Missouri... Southeastern Texas County in south central Missouri... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 445 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Raymondville, or 8 miles southeast of Houston, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Current River State Park, Montauk State Park, Echo Bluff State Park, Ozark National Scenic Riverways, Salem, Bunker, Raymondville, Montauk, Turtle, Jadwin, Howes Mill, Darien, Gladden, Eunice, Yukon, Boss, Hartshorn, Solo, Akers and Stone Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for south central Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for south central Missouri.
